header_text: You love to go hiking, but since your HD has been progressing, you fear going alone. You message a friend about your concerns, and they don't respond immediately. After a few minutes, your friend responds that your desire to continue hiking is good.

elements.Text: Your friend thinks that your desire to continue an activity you love is...
